espLightSwitch.instructions: press and hold center button, 1 flash - program on/off, 2 - dim, 3 - bright, 4 - clear

esp433Floureon.instructions: press and hold button till flashing, press button to be assigned, had to do this near to transmitter. to reset: press and hold button while plugging in, flashes quickly then off

esp433Silvercrest.instructions: plug in, press on while flashing to assign a button, press off to delete (first attempt seemed to need to use the all off to delete it)
